additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, corner, pass-through, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 For rent is this exceptional two bedroom furnished apartment, which is located on the second floor of a beautiful newly built house in a prestigious and ecologically clean part of Tbilisi – Sairme Hill.
Living room has a brilliant open view on a park.
Master bedroom features a stylish private shower room.
Second bedroom is cute and comfortable.
Eat-in kitchen is equipped with brand new oven, refrigerator and dishwasher.
Washing machine is in main bathroom.
Every room has an access to own balconies.
All beddings, furniture, kitchen equipment and plasma TV is brand new and have never been used.
